text: aur yadi ve donon dabaav daalen tumapar ki tum saajhee banao mera use, jisaka tumhen koee gyaan nahin, to na[1] maano un donon kee baat aur unake saath raho sansaar[2] mein suchaaru roop se tatha raah chalo usakee, jo dhyaanamagn ho meree or, phir meree hee or tumhen phirakar aana hai, to main tumhen soochit kar doonga usase, jo tum kar rahe the
